meanings.definition: Happening or changing slowly over time.
meanings.sent1: The sun's gradual descent signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: The gradual growth of the plant was a result of consistent care.
meanings.sent3: The snail's gradual race against the turtle was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her gradual smile lit up the room like a sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The gradual fading of the colors in the sky painted a beautiful evening scene.

meanings.definition: Proceeding by small increments or stages.
meanings.sent1: The student made gradual progress in mastering the new concept.
meanings.sent2: The gradual improvement in his health was a relief to his family.
meanings.sent3: The gradual disappearance of the cookies puzzled the children.
meanings.sent4: Her gradual rise to fame was like a slow but steady climb up a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The gradual unfolding of the mystery kept the audience on the edge of their seats.

meanings.sent1: The hikers struggled to climb the gradual slope of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The road had a gradual incline that made it easier for cyclists.
meanings.sent3: The gradual of the hill made it perfect for rolling down.
meanings.sent4: The gradual of the slide provided a smooth and enjoyable ride.
meanings.sent5: The gradual of the ski slope allowed beginners to practice safely.
